Mega Miner Online is a browser-based multiplayer mining game featuring real-time synchronization, procedural world generation, and cross-platform play. Players can mine resources, upgrade equipment, build structures, and interact with others in a shared underground environment. The game includes cloud save functionality, mobile controls, and an admin system for world management.
